titleStmt.title: The reflections on the XXVIII propositions touching the doctrine of the Trinity, in a letter to the clergy, &c. maintain'd, against the Third defence of the said propositions by the same hand.
titleStmt.author: Tindal, Matthew, 1653?-1733.

notesStmt.note: The "Twenty eight propositions" were written by Edward Fowler.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
